column1: #text=Boxer shorts ( also known as loose boxers or as simply boxers ) are a type of undergarment typically worn by men . The term has been used in English since 1944 for all - around - elastic shorts , so named after the shorts worn by boxers , for whom unhindered leg movement ( " footwork " ) is very important

#text=Reasons for a preference for boxers can be attributed to their variety of styles and design and their general appearance while worn , as well as their ability to provide high levels of natural comfort and freedom relative to other male undergarments . Unlike traditional briefs or the more modern boxer briefs , boxers allow for more freedom in the selection of a fabric type and print design
